pullRequest.title: feat(ui): Sorted order of release in ReadmeOss, Clearing Report, Clearing Status Tree View.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please provide a summary of your changes here.

Which issue is this pull request belonging to and how is it solving it? (#960)
Did you add or update any new dependencies that are required for your change? - No


How To Test?


Generate ReadmeOss in txt, html, docx format and  Clearing report  - Release should sorted be alphabetically
Clearing Status Tree View -  Release and project should be sorted alphabetically
Have you implemented any additional tests?


Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit jaideep.palit@siemens.com

nodes.bodyText: Please consider moving this code to another private method to avoid duplication.
